title: 🔥112學年度畢業典禮開放報名至5月10日（五）中午12點整，畢業祝福好禮等你哦！🎉
department: 學務處畢業生及校友服務組
author: 溫小姐
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處畢業生及校友服務組 - 溫小姐 - fengting0804@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6282
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 🔥112學年度畢業典禮開放報名至5月10日（五）中午12點整，畢業祝福好禮等你哦！🎉 
日期： Fri, 19 Apr 2024 09:50:21 +0800

  親愛的應屆畢業生，您們好：
  Dear graduating students,

✨6月1日(六)是本校畢業典禮，這是一個非常重要且值得慶祝🎉的日子。
當日下午16時將於本校體育館，舉辦全校畢業典禮儀式，我們誠摯地邀請您一同共襄盛舉。

✨June 1, 2024 (Saturday) is the school graduation ceremony, an important and celebratory day🎉. The ceremony will be held at 4 pm in the school gymnasium, and we sincerely invite you to join us on this momentous occasion.

  本屆畢業典禮除了隆重的授證代表儀式，校長還為本屆畢業生送上優厚的祝福禮抽獎活動，敬請期待精美好禮。
 
 In addition to the certification ceremony, our president will warmly present the graduation gift drawing activities to this year's graduates. Notably, there are also mystery prizes waiting for you at the event. Take advantage of this rare opportunity!

🎯畢業生們請立馬手刀報名：https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=20889
有參加有機會~~~~~千萬別錯過了！
 (❤️溫馨提醒：抽獎對象為今年畢業的同學，記得要報名， 且當日出席在現場參加全校典禮者才具抽獎兼領獎資格!!記得要提前報名哦!!!報名截止日期只到113年5月10日中午12點截止)。

🎯Please register here to participate and have a chance to win: https://sys.ndhu.edu.tw/SA/XSL_ApplyRWD/ActAnnounce.aspx?ActID=20889  
(❤️Friendly reminder: The lucky draw is only open to this year's graduating students. Register and attend the school-wide ceremony in person to be eligible for the graduation gift drawing activities. Please register in advance; the deadline is 12:00 May 10, 2024.)

學務處 敬邀您一同參與
 NDHU Division of Student Affairs invites you to participate.
